pr_title: Identity Managed Identity & VsCode Credential + Docs Updates

timeline.bodyText: If this is specific to AAD, can this constant be declared in azure-identity where we have everything related to AAD?
timeline.author: srnagar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,6 +23,16 @@
      */
     public static final String PROPERTY_HTTPS_PROXY = "HTTPS_PROXY";
 
+    /**
+     * Endpoint to connect to when using Azure Active Directory managed service identity (MSI).
+     */
+    public static final String PROPERTY_IDENTITY_ENDPOINT = "IDENTITY_ENDPOINT";

timeline.bodyText: Interesting, so this was in azure-identity earlier. What's the reason for moving this to azure-core? I guess these two are needed only when we use the azure-identity library.
timeline.author: srnagar
